name: Athletic Loop
description:
Created in one day for Ludum Dare 47! 

Theme: "Stuck in a loop".

Hop, Jump, Throw Javelins Forever... 

Try to get the best score you can, quit the loop when you can't take anymore.

Jump over hurdles, sneak under other hurdles and fire javelins at clay pigeons.

Controls: 

Space key: Jump

Mouse Left: Fire Javelins

Mouse Right: Quit Loop

Escape key: Quit Game
